item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 12, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump expected to nominate China hawk Rubio for secretary of state
2. China unveils J-35 stealth fighter jet to compete with US
3. Brussels to free up billions of euros for defence and security from EU budget
4. [Opinion] Trump and his mandate for retribution
5. [Opinion] Trump’s European allies think history is turning in their direction
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 12, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
